title: Alternate Power Supply — Minimal Operational Capability

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Provide an alternate power supply for the system that is activated {{ pe-11.1_prm_1 }} and that can maintain minimally required operational capability in the event of an extended loss of the primary power source.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Provision of an alternate power supply with minimal operating capability can be satisfied by accessing a secondary commercial power supply or other external power supply.
